 CxList setAttr = All.FindByMemberAccess("Session.Add");
CxList sanitize = Find_Sanitize() + 
	All.FindByShortName("Session");
CxList input = Find_Inputs();

result = setAttr.InfluencedByAndNotSanitized(input, sanitize);
